Name: Missing header
Quote: "Version 2 and later files use a global header"
Definition: If version is 2 or more, there should be a global header in the container private data

Name: version
Definition: Maximum known version is 3, analysis stops (note: doc sometimes indicates version 4)

Name: version 2
Quote: "Version 2 was never enabled in the encoder thus version 2 files should not exist"
Definition: Version 2 is forbidden, analysis stops

Name: micro_version 2
Quote: "For version 3, micro_version is 4, micro versions prior to this represent pre standard"
Definition: Not supported version, high risk of decoding issue

Name: coder_type
Quote: "0 (Golomb Rice), 1 (Range coder), 2 (Range coder with custom state transition table)"
Definition: coder_type >2 is not supported

Name: state_transition_delta
Definition: (To be defined)

Name: colorspace_type
Definition: colorspace_type >1 is not supported

Name: h_chroma_subsample
Definition: chroma subsampling factor can not be higher than slice width

Name: h_chroma_subsample
Definition: width divided by chroma subsampling factor is not an integer

Name: v_chroma_subsample
Definition: chroma subsampling factor can not be higher than slice height

Name: v_chroma_subsample
Definition: height divided by chroma subsampling factor is not an integer

Name: QuantizationTables
Definition: QuantizationTables incoherency

Name: initial_state_delta
Definition: initial_state_deltas incoherency

Name: ec
Quote: "0(32bit CRC on the global header), 1(32bit CRC per slice and the global header)"
Definition: ec >1 is not supported

Name: intra
Quote: "intra 0(key and non key frames), 1(the video contains only key frames)"
Definition: intra >1 is not supported

Name: crc_parity
Quote: "32bit that are choosen so that the global header as a whole or slice as a whole has a crc"
Definition: CRC is wrong

Name: end of header
Definition: Real header end is met before or after expected header end

Name: slice x / y / width / height
Definition: Slices x/y and slices width/height are not coherant (areas are not sticked)

Name: quant_table_index
Definition: quant_table_index incoherency

Name: picture_structure
Definition: picture_structure >3 is not supported

Name: sar_den
Definition: if num is not 0, den should be not 0

Name: slice_size
Definition: slice_size is bigger than frame size

Name: error_status
Quote: "0(no error), 1(slice contained a correctable error), 2(slice contains a uncorrectable error)"
Definition: error_status >2 is not supported

Name: crc_parity
Quote: "32bit that are choosen so that the global header as a whole or slice as a whole has a crc"
Definition: CRC is wrong

Name: end of slice
Definition: Real slice end is met before or after expected slice end

Name: end of frame
Definition: Real frame end is met before or after expected frame end
